Abbreviations: lateral OFG, lateral orbital gyrus; IPL, inferior parietal lobe; MFG, middle frontal gyrus; sgACC, subgenual anterior cingulate cortex; pgACC, pregenual anterior cingulate cortex; MDD, major depression disorder; HC, health control; TEPS, Temporal Experience of Pleasure Scale; PFm, parietal area F, part m, which belongs to temporo-parieto-occipital junction.
